body_html:
If it is indeed PTX compilation, you can look at the timeline, like this:

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/client/timeline_test.py#L44

The first GPU kernel takes a really long time, without a good reason.

body:
If it is indeed PTX compilation, you can look at the timeline, like this:

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/client/timeline_test.py#L44

The first GPU kernel takes a really long time, without a good reason.
